name: RainbowQuest
description:
Sixteen year old Cameron, who’s just found out about her own sexual orientation, has been grounded for the whole summer break. However, all the thoughts and questions arising in her head are seeking for answers and thus, with her smartphone taken away, she communicates through nightly letters with her friends. She must be careful when searching for the letters in her home at night though, since her parents are unaware of her sexual orientation yet and she fears for the worse should they find out.

Our Team:

Laura Winkel - Narrative Design and Process Documentation

Lea Steenbock - 2D/3D art/modeling and Level Design/Building

Leonard Sabbagh - Coding and Sound

Nathalie Annuß - Coding and Project Management
